# OpenSeesDays2013

A two-day workshop on OpenSees sponsored by NEES and PEER.

August 26-27, 2013

University of California, Richmond Field Station

Day 1 : Getting Started

  1. Introduction to OpenSees,
  2. OpenSees and Tcl, Frank McKenna,
  3. OpenSees & Output, Frank McKenna
  4. Basic Modeling & Analysis By Example, Frank McKenna
  5. Nonlinear Analysis With Examples, Frank McKenna
  6. Lunch

Day 2 : Beyond the Basics

to obtain examlples: svn co svn://opensees.berkeley.edu/usr/local/svn/OpenSees/trunk/Workshops/OpenSeesDays OpenSeesDays
